gridlayout 0.1.0
  • Reference

Reference

Creating layouts

Functions relating to creating and displaying gridlayout objects

new_gridlayout()

Construct a gridlayout object from basic parts

md_to_gridlayout()

Build grid layout obj from markdown table

to_md()

Convert layout to markdown table

rmd_to_gridlayout()

Extract gridlayout from rmd file

get_elements()

Get elements and positions out of a grid layout

Using layouts

Functions for utilizing layouts in Shiny apps or RMarkdown documents

grid_page()

Setup gridlayout UI for shiny app

grid_container()

Build gridlayout container for specified layout

use_gridlayout_rmd()

Enable gridlayout usage in RMarkdown documents

use_gridlayout_shiny()

Convert layout to css for Shiny

to_css()

Convert grid layout to css string

to_app_template()

Build Shiny app template based on a grid layout

Grided layout builder app

Functions for using the grided app for generating layouts with a graphical interface. These are typically called by the RStudio addin functionality and thus not called directly.

update_rmd()

Update a layout chunk in a rmd document

grided_addin()

Edit a grid layout as selected

grided_new_app()

Create gridlayout and build new app

Contents

gridlayout is built for R Markdown, an ecosystem of packages for creating computational documents in R. Learn more at rmarkdown.rstudio.com.

Developed by Nick Strayer. Site built with pkgdown.
